thread.title: Platinum Service Manager - Sports Management

title: Platinum Service Manager - Sports Management
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Platinum Service Manager Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Main liaison for Platinum Premier accounts. Help manage, recruit, schedule, train and deploy Concierge staff for all premium events at the facility. Renews Platinum Gold Circle and Premier Seats.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
